page.title: 17Shops
page.content: would not be brought quickly enough. {Food stores and Grocceries.} Groceries are fairly easily obtainable in the area,especially in St.Mawes but, in the Portscatho area there are no bakeries where fresh bread can be obtained.People in this part of the block rely on the services of a mobile grocery van who visits the area daily supplying local needs. {Gift Shops. Although the area relies very much on the tourist trade,the area has not been taken over by gift shops,souvenir shops and craft centres.These types of shops number very small and it may be that the lack of this type of shop is an added attraction to the are leaving it largely unspoilt.
